definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: Much could be gained by creating an international network of websites committed to such principles.
sentences.chinese: 創建一個遵循這些原則的國際互聯網站獲益頗豐。

sentences.english: The internet sites send visitors to your project and every person benefits from that.
sentences.chinese: 互聯網站發送旅客到您的項目，並從每個人的利益。

sentences.english: The State protects the lawful rights and interests of Internet websites regarding the engagement in news publication services.
sentences.chinese: 國家保護互聯網站從事登載新聞業務的合法權益。
